name: Your Hidden Potential
tag_list: entrepreneurs, community-portal, blog, startup-blog, business-advice, young-entrepreneur-forum
overview:
Your Hidden Potential (YHP) a blog and community portal which caters to entrepreneurs and aspiring entrepreneurs alike.

YHP was founded by Rishi Chowdhury & Joseph Ajilore in 2011 as a way to help motivate, inspire and help entrepreneurs, especially young entrepreneurs.

The site is being built to accommodate a community portal where aspiring entrepreneurs and business owners can share advice, resources and skills to help start or further their business.
